verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
i don't want silver and i don't want gold
things of this world will soon grow old
give me jesus and i'll be satisfied
well, i don't want houses and i don't want lands
i'd rather feel the touch of his nail-scarred hands
give me jesus and i'll be satisfied.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
just give me jesus, what a wonderful lord
give me jesus and take the things of this old world
give me jesus and let me in his love abide
give me jesus and i'm satisfied.
